name: Dreamer
description: Dreamers are people able to tap into the power of dreams and nearby dimensions and create fantastical effects as a result.  They can even pull some of this dream material into our world to build other things with it.

name: Eater of Dreams
description: These people are aware of this cross dimensional contamination and while they can't pull anything over and make new things, they can eat anything they find in our world that doesn't belong and gain abilities and powers from that consumption.
